metadata.name: HackTool - DInjector PowerShell Cradle Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of the Dinject PowerShell cradle based on the specific flags

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /am51')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /password')))

output.summary: Detects the use of the Dinject PowerShell cradle based on the specific flags
